data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Support identity verification requirements". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #1 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #1 API Trace
